     yes that sounds about right

     why can't i listen to your question, on the questions page

     you could try editing the hell out of them, and adding pictures/captions to make them more exciting, and take out the bad parts

1.29.19  4:59 pm   when was hallelujah written

     first chorus was written on aug 21, 2012, the rest of the song written may 22-24, 2016

1.29.19  4:56 pm   I've noticed that if you multiply two numbers, both of which are from the set {37, 3367, 333667, 33336667, ...}, you always get an ascending digit sequence (e.g. 37*333667=12345679) where the numbers either stay the same or increase. Do you think that this property holds in every case?

     yes

1.29.19  4:55 pm   What are your thoughts on saxophone and having a horn section in your music? 

     need trumpet and sax, at least

1.29.19  4:38 pm   Like you were back in the older days, I am trying to organize my projects and figure out how I can ever possibly proceed effectively.

     i still do that

      It's taking longer that I'd like.

     welcome to earth

      How did you do it? Can you spare a tip?

     ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

1.29.19  4:00 pm   When you go on tour will you come to DC?

     sure

1.29.19  3:42 pm   I sometimes have the feeling people overrate your ability to give personalised one-on-one advice and underrate your ability to I don't know just off the top of my head... make music

Do you agree [with the fact that I have the right to think that no matter how wrong I might be]?

     sometimes yes and sometimes no

1.29.19  3:25 pm   Do you make money in ways other than stuff related to your art?

     no

1.29.19  2:45 pm   never having played drums i'm not sure exactly what the overlap is between real-drum skills and air-drum skills, but it seems like having nothing to rebound off of might make it surprisingly difficult to play air drums convincingly. in any case, since your drum tracks are sequenced, i have no way of gauging your real-drum skills (though since i think you said you learned them first? maybe i made that up. i assume your real-drum skills are good anyway) i can only evaluate your air-drumming, and not even then because i am not a skilled drummer. BUT the point of this question is: do you, presumably most qualified to judge, think your air-drumming convincingly resembles your real-drumming?

     yes

      it is most impressive and i very much enjoy looking at it (even in multiple-take perfectionist instagram posts where some of the takes are not what you wanted)

1.29.19  2:23 pm   How do you remember stuff about the music you listen to?

     it's kind of like remembering things about people

      I'm asking specifically about your answers to the questions "what are some songs with only 2 chords" and "with only 1 chord". You listed like a total of 20 songs of various genres, periods and levels of popularity. Did you have to look them up or do you just know all these songs by heart including their chords? 

     i went browsing through my itunes, to remind me of songs, but i generally know what they sound like without listening. in some cases i went searching to make sure there weren't any other parts. for example, many songs i knew the main sections were 2 chords, but i went searching around the song to make sure it didn't have something at the end that i forgot about, etc. For example, it's like if someone says "name someone who only wears red, white, and yellow." Ronald McDonald may come to mind, but i might just take a glance just to make sure there isn't a bit of blue somewhere that i forgot about. i hope that makes sense

1.29.19  1:21 pm   why so many instrumentals from 2012?

     i guess i couldn't figure out what the hell i'm doing. instrumentals are usually a symptom of that

1.29.19  1:05 pm   What is 4 times 8?

     i couldn't possibly imagine

     good deeds

     yes

     fair enough

     the majority of the favorite color questions have not been shown here

     yes, with the right mindset

     about 100,000

     impossible!

     sure

      are you engaged in the contemporary art world at all?

     not that i know of

1.29.19  9:51 am   why is water so underrated

     because it's so simple

1.29.19  9:27 am   Is there a trick to evaluating how good a project you're working on is so far? My opinion constantly fluctuates and it paralyzes my decision making

     the only way to really know is to see it fresh, from the beginning, in real time, after not having seen it for awhile

1.29.19  9:16 am   1.27.19  8:04 pm   what is your set up for this? how can i do that

     you can do it with your phone, but i use a smaller device called a 'digital voice recorder.' i can't say what brand it is but i've been using the same one since 2010 (and before that i was using a similar one.) if you search for digital voice recorders i think you will find the kind of device i am talking about. i've discovered the best thing is to put it in the small pocket on the sun visor. then i discovered that this actually vibrates sometimes, (unfortunately most recordings i have from 2015 have a lot of vibrations in them) but after doing the journal edits project (making the reality page) in 2016 i discovered that i could use a glove to cushion the recorder, and also place a folded sock between the visor and the ceiling. this fixed the problem. that was in my previous car, and my current car, the pocket was actually too tight to hold the voice recorder but after stretching it out a bit now it fits. and i don't think there are any vibration problems but who knows, maybe there are, and i will discover it when i do the next round of reality edits

1.29.19  8:32 am   have you been making music since 2000?

     way before then

1.29.19  8:26 am   i have this song i gotta record that has strumming guitar but i don't play guitar. what are the alternatives i can do (i play keys)

     if you can get some percussion / drums on there that would help

1.29.19  8:23 am   You have said people should not stay in school unless they need to, but suggest keeping jobs that are disliked.

     i disagree

      What's the difference?

     i don't know

      Either way you're making yourself do something you don't want to in order to improve your life in other ways.

1.29.19  8:15 am   Are toy instruments better to make music with?

     sometimes

1.29.19  8:10 am   what should i do on the hour long bus ride to school every day

     write stories

1.29.19  8:03 am   Are weather men always right on their predictions?

     no

1.29.19  8:01 am   How much content (songs, videos, etc.) have you recorded/made in the past that you have not released yet or decided to never release?

     almost none, but it depends what you are counting as content
